  • Method Details

    • getAppointmentsFromDatabase

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsFromDatabase() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all appointments from the database and returns them as an ObservableList of Appointment objects.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of Appointment objects containing all appointments from the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there are errors with the database connections or queries.
